thread.title: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte reveals help from Blues legend | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte reveals help from Blues legend | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte reveals help from Blues legend | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 5:21 pm Antonio Conte is grateful for Carlo Cudicini’s English tips (Picture: Getty) 
Chelsea manager Antonio Conte has revealed how former Blues goalkeeper Carlo Cudicini is helping him improve his English and get his message across at Stamford Bridge. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The Italian tactician moved to England for the first time when he took the Chelsea job last summer, and has benefited from the presence of his fellow countryman on his coaching team. 
Cudicini, 43, spent nine years on the books at Chelsea and was regarded as one of the finest ‘keepers in the Premier League on his day, and is now playing a vital role as Conte’s assistant. Cudicini has been working as Conte’s assistant this season (Picture: Getty) 
Speaking to the club’s official site, Conte explained just how much he’s enjoyed working with the former shot-stopper.
